name: Uki (RayureBob)
description:
Uki is a minimalistic platformer entirely played with the mouse.

The game is currently just a prototype. Aside from the core gameplay, everything is subject to change.

I aim to build around what I already have to make a full experience, with many different levels and sound design.

There are things that should be reworked so I will probably start with that, then streamline creation tools and finaly build a game with everything :)
